pages.text: Used to store and imbue arrows with potion effects. Right click with the quiver in your hand to transfer arrows from your inventory into the quiver. Press '$(k:cofh.mode_change_increment)' to toggle imbuement, which takes 50mb of the stored $(l:thermal:technology/potion_fluid)potion fluid$(/l) per arrow. The quiver can be filled and augmented in the Tinker's Workbench.

pages.title: Alchemical Quiver
pages.text: It can be enchanted with $(l:thermal:world/holding)Holding$(/l) to improve fluid capacity.
